title: "Extract entities from insurance documents using Amazon Comprehend named entity recognition"
excerpt: "Intelligent document processing (IDP) is a common use case for customers on AWS. You can utilize&nbsp;Amazon Comprehend&nbsp;and&nbsp;Amazon Textract&nbsp;for a variety of use cases ranging from document extraction, data classification, and entity extraction. One specific industry that uses IDP is insurance."
